content: **how a free crochet along works** the pattern is released in 3 parts over 2 weeks and each part is available for free on my blog click here 1 to join my fb group for pattern support and to share your progress photos click here 2 to subscribe to my blog to get an email notification sent to you each time i publish a part **cal dates** pattern preamble - 30 september 2025 part 1 - 3 october 2025 part 2 - 7 october 2025 part 3 - 10 october 2025 **purchase the pdf crochet pattern** if you would like to purchase the advert free pdf pattern please follow the link below to your preferred shop click here 3 to purchase from my etsy shop you can also purchase from my ravelry store **what you get included in the paid pattern** a pdf pattern with easy-to-follow written instructions over 50 clear tutorial photographs a print friendly version full pattern support **pattern discounts bundle and save** **ravelry** coupon code 15off purchase any 2 patterns and get 15% discount coupon code 20off purchase any 3 patterns and get 20% discount coupon code 25off purchase any 4 patterns and get 25% discount **etsy** coupon code save15 purchase any 2 patterns and get 15% discount coupon code save20 purchase any 3 patterns and get 20% discount coupon code save25 purchase any 4 patterns and get 25% discount what you will get instant download step by step pattern with loads of clear photos and a print friendly pattern what you will crochet a mini blanket referred to as a lovey attached to an amigurumi soft toy every child should get a chance to love one finished size each lovey blanket is 30cm x 30cm 12 x 12 with an amigurumi head and arms attached to one corner crochet skill easy to confident beginner the pattern has helpful hints along the way which are highlighted what you need +/- 250g 4 ply sport i used 100% bamboo eco-friendly yarn the right hook size for your yarn i used a 2 5 mm hook some stuffing sewing needle stitch marker and scissors if you use thicker yarn than me your lovey blanket might be too big for a baby so remember that when choosing your yarn notes i use us crochet terms if making for babies/small children remember safety first 1 https //www facebook com/groups/249639565737687 2 https //mandmcrochetdesigns com/subscribe/ 3 https //mandmcrochetstore etsy com/listing/4377033477
